content: i have been wanting to design and make this square for a while now and today after renee good s murder it seemed like a good day this square is meant to honor victims of ice including silverio villegas gonzalez carlos roberto montoya valdez genry ruiz guillén serawit gezahegn dejene maksym chernyak juan alexis tineo-martinez brayan garzón-rayo nhon ngoc nguyen marie ange blaise abelardo avellaneda delgado jesus molina-veya johnny noviello isidro pérez tien xuan phan chaofeng ge lorenzo antonio batrez vargas oscar rascon duarte norlan guzman-fuentes miguel ángel garcía medina santos banegas reyes ismael ayala-uribe huabing xie leo cruz-silva hasan ali moh d saleh josué castro rivera gabriel garcia aviles kai yin wong francisco gaspar-andrés pete sumalo montejo shiraz fatehali sachwani jean wilson brutus fouad saeed abdulkadir delvin francisco rodriguez nenko stanev gantchev keith porter and renee nicole good i know this is a far from extensive list in both name and ice crimes but i wanted some of their name here this pattern is written for interlocking crochet however a chart for mosaic crochet and basic c2c is included **there are no instructions for the mosaic crochet or c2c - just the chart so you will need to have prior knowledge or look up how to do these techniques ** the methods have not been tested so if you find any errors please alert me i have also never used the c2c part of my software - i generated this on request and genuinely do not know if there are errors this square is the same size as my other interlocking patterns so it will fit with any of those squares if you are interested in assembling pieces together with a 5 mm hook and worsted weight yarn the square ends up being approx 12 inches by 12 inches in the photo i used fingering weight yarn that i dyed and a 3 75 mm hook and it is about 8 inches by 8 inches please let me know if you have any other questions -sj
